snippet: One Iraqi, returning to Baghdad after five years, finds his country's new normal--violence, political crises and uncertainty.
abstract: One Iraqi, returning to Baghdad after five years, finds his country's new normal--violence, political crises and uncertainty.
lead_paragraph: The boom and shudder of numerous explosions woke me. It was my first morning in Baghdad in nearly five years, and, coincidentally, only days after the withdrawal of the American troops from Iraq.

headline.main: Living Amid the Violence in Iraq
